urls.title: Home – Subjectio - Subjectio - An online storytelling project about the influence of Russian and Western powers on the perception of reality.
urls.description: Subjectio is a digital project exploring the mechanisms utilised by superpowers, the West and Russia, to manipulate the public perspective, to strengthen and execute a political agenda. By mimicking their way of contextualising photography, video and analysis, Subjectio aims to expose techniques to steer online discussions. Through an innovative online storytelling format, Subjectio materializes within existing online conversations on various social media platforms.

@n_j_davis @EnvAgencySE The name comes from the Brocas family, local nobility in C13th. 
Sir Bernard Brocas, Master of the Horse to King Edward III, was a good friend of the Black Prince. 
The Brocas is very popular for picnics and great views of Windsor Castle.
Source: https://t.co/oflgVnpoqp

text: @offy_bromley @TM_WRT @YorkshireWater @EnvAgencyYNE @YorksWildlife @bradfordmdc @YorkDalesRT @CLAtweets It's not rocket science, its hydrology. Rivers seek to establish a natural equilibrium. When you deepen a river, it slows down and drops more sediment out and the bed levels out. Or it will cut back upstream and undermine walls and bridges.

text:
Looks nasty, doesn’t it! 🤮

Something to remember when you’re clearing up from Christmas dinner 🍽️🦃

Let those fats, oils and grease cool, then scrape them into the bin 👍

Don’t pour them in the sink 👎

#BinIt4Beaches
